Text.Page:
You've hurt the argons, but we're not done. If the federation sends a battalion of troops, we need mobility to use them effectively.

Hit the argons around the Northern Teleport Platform. If we get reinforcements, I don't intend to waste their lives at an unsecured site.

Hey â€”hold on a moment. If you're heading to the {@Creature:249#1102} I need a favor.

There's an unusual argonomorph type called the zariik cyclops. They've got beautiful wings. Can't miss 'em.

Bring me those wings. I'll put them to good use.

The Mysterium pays well for argonomorph parts. They hope to reverse the process one day.

A worthy goal...a worthy, well-paying goal.

Look, you'd kill them securing the teleport platform anyway.

This is just killing two gulas with one spear.

Glad you're back. I'm tired of writing letters to families who'll never see their loved one again.

All right. You did your job. Let's get on to the next one.
